text.title: Officials say co-pilot intentionally crashed Germanwings Airbus
text.head: Officials say co-pilot intentionally crashed Germanwings Airbus
Sources

list.item: "Germanwings crash: Co-pilot 'treated for depression'" — BBC News Online , March 27, 2015
Josh Levs, Laura Smith-Spark, Holly Yan. "Germanwings Flight 9525 co-pilot deliberately crashed plane, officials say" — CNN , March 26, 2015
